titles.title: God In The Gospel Of His Son (familiar easy tu

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God in the gospel Of His Son Makes His eternal Counsels known Where love in all Its glory shines And truth is drawn In fairest lines{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here sinners of A humble frame May taste His grace And learn His name May read in characters Of blood The wisdom pow'r and grace of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The pris'ner here may Break his chains The weary Rest from all his pains The captive feel His bondage cease The mourner find The way of peace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here faith reveals To mortal eyes A brighter world Beyond the skies Here shines the light Which guides our way From earth To realms of endless day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O grant us grace Almighty Lord To read and mark Thy holy Word Its truths with meekness To receive And by its holy precepts live{/lang-eng}
